Reviews.Title: An excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Don M
Reviews.Content: I liked this camera a lot.  The Canon name ensures quality and the manufacture quality was flawless.  The value was excellent compared to others.  I have not hesitation in recommending it to anyone.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Dual Pixel CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens Brand New USA w/ All Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II SLR Lens Brand New USA w/Supplied Manufacturer Accessories
LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Charger
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital High Speed Memory Card
